name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
changelog:
- Fixed an issue where tracking status would update a frame late.
- Fixed an error with getting muscle traits on start (i was lazy).
